panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page
panels.title: Instances

panels.description:
Database of this cluster ${cls}

Load: active_time / backends (PG14 only)

Query RT : max query rt of this database

Client: Pgbouncer Active Clients

Server: Pgbouncer Active Servers

Backend: Postgres num backends

T = is Template?

D = Disabled in Pgbouncer ?

P = Paused in Pgbouncer ?
panels.title: Database

panels.description: Number of backends for each instances among this cluster
panels.title: Session

panels.description:
Overall pressure for this PostgreSQL Node and Instance. 
max(node:ins:cpu_usage, pg:ins:load, pgbouncer:ins:load)
panels.title: Cluster Pressure

panels.description: Total transactions (commit + rollback) per second from PostgreSQL in last 5 minutes
panels.title: Total Xacts

panels.description:
R▲ for disk read bandwidth
TX▲ for network transmit bandwidth
RX▼ for network receive bandwidth
W▼ for disk write bandwidth
panels.title: Disk Bandwidth

panels.description:
R▲ for disk read bandwidth
TX▲ for network transmit bandwidth
RX▼ for network receive bandwidth
W▼ for disk write bandwidth
panels.title: Network Bandwidth

panels.description: Replication Lag (WAL Replay Lag) measured in bytes
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: Tuples fetched, inserted, updated, delete among this cluster
